flawed_nl_solution:
He now buys 4/2=<<4/2=2>>2 coffees
The new price is 2*0.5=$<<2*0.5=1>>1 more than the old price
So he now pays 2+1=$<<2+1=1>>1 per coffee
So he spends 1*2=$<<1*2=2>>2
He used to spend 4*2=$<<4*2=8>>8
So he saves 8-2=$<<8-2=6>>6 per day
